Spendee¶

This is a package for interfacing with a wonderful Spendee app.

Warning¶

No guarantees are provided here. If you wanna use it, go for it, but do know that the original API is undocumented and while it works at the time of writing, it might stop at any time. I’m not associated with Spendee in any way.

Installation¶

  1. Be Python 3.7+ ready

  2. pip install spendee

  3. Enjoy.

Endpoints¶

This is a list of all endpoints I’ve discovered. So far only a subset is implemented:

  • [ ] v1.3/currencies

Methods¶

request(method, url[, version, headers])

Adds additional functionality over super’s request method: 1.

user_registration([email, password, …])

Sign up a new user

user_login([device_uuid])

Method to authenticate the user

user_logout([version, url])

Logout the user

user_get_profile([version, url])

Retrieve the user profile

user_update_profile(firstname, lastname, …)

Update the user profile

user_currencies([version, url])

Retrieve all the currencies available

get_all_user_categories([version, url])

Returns a list of all user defined categories

banks_get_all([version, url])

Returns a list of all connected bank accounts

bank_login_detail(login_id[, includeBank, …])

Get details of a bank account

wallet_get_all([version, url])

Returns a list of all user’s wallets

wallet_get_transactions([offset, limit, …])

Retrieve all the transactions

wallet_create(name, currency[, order, …])

Create a wallet

wallet_update(id, name, currency[, …])

Update the wallet settings

wallet_delete(wallet_id[, version, url])

Delete a wallet

wallet_invite_to_share(wallet_id, emails[, …])

Invite to share a wallet with another user

wallet_unshare_user(wallet_id, emails[, …])

Delete an invite to a wallet

wallet_create_category(name[, wallet_id, …])

Create a category

wallet_delete_category(category_id[, …])

Delete a category

wallet_update_category(id, wallet_id, name)

Update category

get_budgets([version, url])

Retrieves a list of user’s budgets

create_budget(name, limit, currency, …[, …])

Create a budget

category_image_ids([version, url])

Retrieves a list of all IDs of category icons

countries([version, url])

Retrieves a list of all available countries

get_transaction_templates([version, url])

Retrieves a list of scheduled/repeating transactions
